I *LOVE* PMK Saitoh his hair is perfect!!!....
and if you check out this link you'll know that I greatly appreciate 
PMK Saitoh's hair http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/sig6.jpg

His sleepy eyes are sooo cute...you want to try you hand and drawing 
PMK Saitoh when he is actually *awake*? (^_^) that is when he is 
fighting LOL!

Burai Saitoh has nice hair too...but I think the hair is historically 
innaccurate...I mean can we all imagine these guys flicking their 
hair back all the time or brushing away their bangs? ::giggles::
